nodes.text: The Dartiss-5 Caravel was a barge-like Huttian design produced by Ubrikkian Industries.

Consisting of a barge-like form, the Dartiss had a four person cockpit at the front of the ship on the top deck; connected to the cockpit was a corridor, which held thirteen cabins and two airlocks divided between the port and starboard sides. Each cabin measured four by six meters, and was capable of comfortably housing four passengers - aft of the cabins at the end of the corridor was a small engineering section, as well as a turbolift that lead to the cargo deck.

Used by Hutts as space Yachts, older Dartiss-5's that were in disrepair were known to fall into the hands of non-Hutts for use as transports and smuggling vessels, as was the case with the the Lost Lady. Extremely modifiable, the Dartiss could be heavily modified - the Lost Lady having heavy shields, armor, turbolasers, and concussion missile launchers.

Because the Lost Lady is the only known ship of this type, the stock unmodified stats of the Dartiss-5 cannot be known; hyperdrive, armament, and all other attributes may be significantly different from those listed.
